lead_paragraph: Josh Pinkard, the starting Southern California free safety, tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee in the third-ranked Trojans’ 50-14 opening victory over Arkansas and will not play again this season.
snippet: Josh Pinkard, the starting Southern California free safety, tore the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee in the third-ranked Trojans’ 50-14 opening victory over Arkansas and will not play again this season.
